title: The After Show with Mr. Jonathan Carney
itunes:title: The After Show with Mr. Jonathan Carney
description:
Jonathan Carney from La Flor Dominicana joins us on The After Show. He’s very aggravated about something, and he’s not afraid to share that with our listeners. The After Show is brought to you by RoMa Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
